name: IdleDungeon
description:
Idle Dungeon - Adventurer Tycoon  is an idle card game, the theme revolves around a group of hard - Sword, Magic, Monster, Adventurer and Dungeons!

You need to recruit hero with different skills to form a team and raiders the Dungeon, Also, strengthen your team by upgrade the hero!

Features

-Simple and fun, you can play at any time, anywhere!

-Unique skills and Hero

-Endless dungeon!
